description: {"blocks":[{"key":"5sfag","text":"These samples are part of the JAX-Sen project in the SenNet Consortium. We aim to study and characterize senescence in the C57Bl/6 mouse heart. We compare young (6 months old) and old (24 months old) mouse hearts using scRNAsequencing. This protocol describes the single-cell dissociation of the hearts before library preparation and sequencing.","type":"align-justify","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

funders.funder_name: National Institute on Aging (NIA) JAX-Sen Senescence Tissue Mapping Center Grant

groups.title: Cellular Senescence Network (SenNet) Method Development Community

status.info: We use this protocol and it's working

steps.step: {"blocks":[{"key":"b6l9q","text":"5 ml Protein lobind tubes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"a117e","text":"1.5 or 2 ml Protein lobind tubes","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"6se4j","text":"Micro scissors/ scalpel","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"f6lqa","text":"Ice-cold PBS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"4gqvp","text":"Wide-bore pipette tips","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"69msi","text":"0.25% Trypsin/EDTA (Gibco, 25200056). -  2 ml/sample","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"dji8h","text":"20 mg/mL collagenase A and B (Sigma, 10103578001, 11088807001) – 2 ml/sample","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"euj5s","text":"DMEM + 10% FBS","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"emob1","text":"100 µm cell strainer (Corning, 431752)","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"8t6i9","text":"HBSS (Ca2+/Mg2+ free) (Gibco, 14170120) – 2 ml/sample","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"sup","offset":8,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":13,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"g7qe","text":"ACK lysis buffer – 2 ml/sample","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"aljmc","text":"SS_buffer – 5 ml/sample","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9j3r6","text":"40 um cell strainer","type":"unordered-list-item","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"25ui8","text":"70 uM {"blocks":[{"key":"80mci","text":"Collect shipment from the warehouse.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8hv2o","text":"Fill up ice buckets and prep them with reagents:","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"885tc","text":"Bucket 1(small): PBS, HBSS, DMEM+FBS, SS_buffer","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}},{"key":"9hd2u","text":"Bucket 2 (large): For mincing tissue","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"cckhf","text":"Confirm if the sample is cold. Take pictures.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"6g5om","text":"Place tubes on ice and mince the tissue (\u003c1mm) with sterile micro scissors.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"UNDERLINE","offset":0,"length":18}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}
{"blocks":[{"key":"drmsh","text":"After mincing, transfer the sample into labeled 5 ml tubes. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2rqqt","text":"Centrifuge at 500 x g, 4°C, 5 min to get rid of the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8bt46","text":"Resuspend the pellet in ice-cold PBS (Ca+ and Mg+ free) and pipette up and down gently with wide-bore pipette tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":31}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"1cuql","text":"Centrifuge at 500 x g, 4°C, 5 min to get rid of the supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"34q0g","text":"Resuspend the pellet in ice-cold PBS (Ca+ and Mg+ free) and pipette up and down gently with wide-bore pipette tip.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":32}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"72rbj","text":"Centrifuge at 500 x g, 4°C, 5 min to get rid of the supernatant. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"38gc2","text":"Add 2 ml of 0.25% Trypsin/EDTA to the pellet and enzymatically digest at 37°C for 10 min with slow rocking.  Check at 5 mins for dissociation, under the microscope.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":12,"length":19},{"style":"bold","offset":73,"length":15},{"style":"bold","offset":109,"length":55},{"style":"italic","offset":109,"length":55}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"prhi","text":"Stop the digestion by adding an equal volume (1ml) of DMEM/10% FBS.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":54,"length":12}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8fi8h","text":"Centrifuge at 500 x g, 4°C, 5 min to get rid of the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"fr7qi","text":"Resuspend the pellet 2 ml of 20 mg/mL collagenase A and B mixture and incubate the samples at 37 °C until the tissues were into single cells.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":29,"length":28}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"4a2s9","text":"Vigorously pipette samples with 1 ml wide-bore pipette tips or if needed, regular tips.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"d4og0","text":"Filter cells through MACS SmartStrainers (70um) and wash 1 ml HBSS (Ca2+/Mg2+ free) through the strainer.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":20,"length":27},{"style":"bold","offset":62,"length":22},{"style":"sup","offset":70,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":75,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"29btd","text":"Centrifuge at 500 x g, 4°C, 5 min to get rid of the supernatant.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":14,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"8tnr5","text":"Resuspend the cell pellet in 2 mL  ACK Lysing buffer, and incubate on ice for 3 min to exclude RBCs.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":35,"length":17},{"style":"bold","offset":70,"length":13}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"9071e","text":"Add 5 mL SS_buffer  to stop  ACK Lysing buffer reaction, then collect cells by centrifugation 500 x g, 4°C, 5 min.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":9,"length":9},{"style":"bold","offset":94,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"2gub3","text":"Resuspend the pellet in 1ml of HBSS (Ca2+/Mg2+ free) (Gibco, 14170120).","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":24,"length":4},{"style":"bold","offset":31,"length":22},{"style":"bold","offset":70,"length":1},{"style":"sup","offset":39,"length":2},{"style":"sup","offset":44,"length":2}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"cu634","text":"Filter the cell suspension through  Flowmi 40um cell strainers tube to remove debris and non-dissociated tissue fragments. ","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":36,"length":26}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

{"blocks":[{"key":"c6lst","text":"Collect cells by centrifugation 500 x g, 4°C, 5 min and proceed to Flex protocol.","type":"unstyled","depth":0,"inlineStyleRanges":[{"style":"bold","offset":32,"length":19}],"entityRanges":[],"data":{}}],"entityMap":{}}

title: JAX-Sen: Mouse heart dissociation for single-cell RNA sequencing
title_html: JAX-Sen: Mouse heart dissociation for single-cell RNA sequencing
